summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 56, Gilman Park Addition, being the alley between Market Street and West 56th Street, from 17th Avenue Northwest to 20th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other alleys, streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14685 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
